resources.string:
" 0.9.12 - 2012-05-03:
 - New Spanish language available
 - Minor bug fixes

 0.9.11 - 2012-04-25:
 - New line 215 (Béziers - Bédarieux)
 - New line 204 (Béziers - Saint-Nazaire-de-Ladarez)
 - New line 232 (Béziers - Olonzac)
 - Updated schedules for line 302 (Montpellier - Clermont l'Hérault)

 0.9.10 - 2012-04-18:
 - New line 211 (Béziers - Portiragnes)
 - New line 212 (Béziers - Lespignan)
 - New line 213 (Béziers - Vendres)
 - Updated schedules for line 313 (Bélarga - Montpellier)
 - Updated schedules for line 131 (Pérols - Palavas Les Flots)
 - Updated schedules for line 106 (Montpellier - Aigues Mortes)
 - Removed deprecated line schedules: 103/312 été, 103 été, 106 été, 121 été, 131 été, 162 été, 211 été, 212 213 été, 274 été

 0.9.9 - 2012-04-07:
 Updated schedules and connections for the folling lines:
 - 106 (Montpellier - Aigues Mortes)
 - 107 (Lattes - Marsillargues)
 - 117 Vailhauques (Montpellier - Vailhauquès)
 - 117 Murviel (Montpellier - Murviel les Montpellier)
 - 125 (Lattes - St Aunès)
 - 131 (Pérols - Palavas Les Flots)
 - 132 (Navette du Petit Travers)
 - 301/380 (Clermont l'Hérault - Lodève)
 - 301/381 (Montpellier - Millau)
 - 302 (Montpellier - Clermont l'Hérault)
 - 303/485 (Montpellier - St Pons de Thomières)
 - 305 (Montpellier - Aspiran)
 - 306 (Montpellier - Fontès)
 - 307 (Clermont l'Hérault - Plaissan)
 - 308 (Montpellier - Clermont l'Hérault)
 - 482/485 (Montpellier - St Pons de Thomières)

 0.9.8 - 2012-04-04:
 - New line 303/485 (Saint-Pons-de-Thomières - Montpellier)
 - New 'all lines in city' option showing in the contextual menu of bookmarked stations and by clicking on station names on any bus line's page
 - New 'quick search' shortcut on the home page (better ergonomics)
 - New settings option to hide maps showing city location (convenient if no network is available)

 0.9.7 - 2012-04-02:
 - City location is displayed on Google maps
 - Performance improvements

 0.9.6 - 2012-03-23:
 - New line 302 (Clermont-l'Hérault - Montpellier)
 - New line 120 (Montpellier - Montpellier airport shuttle)
 - New line 210 (Béziers - Béziers airport shuttle)
 - New line 313 (Bélarga - Montpellier)

 0.9.5 - 2012-03-16:
 - Updated schedules for line 112 (Sommières - Castelnau-le-Lez)

 0.9.4 - 2012-02-11:
 - Fixed bug related to random bookmarked stations deletion
 - New line 482/485 (Saint-Pons-de-Thomières - Montpellier)

 0.9.3 - 2012-02-07:
 New lines:
 - 301/380 (Lodève - Clermont-l'Hérault)
 - 304/380 (Clermont-l'Hérault - Pézenas)
 - 117 (Vailhauquès - Montpellier)

 0.9.2 - 2012-02-02:
 - New line 117 (Murviel-les-Montpellier - Montpellier)

 0.9.1 - 2012-01-30:
 - Adding line 216 (Saint-Jean-de-Védas - Béziers)
 - Bigger fonts on settings page

 0.9 - 2012-01-29:
 - 53 bus lines
 - Take holidays (zone A) and public holidays into account for schedule computation
 - Voice recognition support for searching bus stations, lines or cities
 - Support for bookmarking bus stations
 - Share schedules with friends
 - Only bus schedules for now
 - First public release "
